name: Wordzle
description:
A fun word guessing game, Choose from a 5 letter word or 6 letter word puzzle. Play daily or play in endless mode to see how many words you know.

Try to guess the WORDZLE in 6 tries or less. Your guess must be a valid word. Press the enter button to submit your guess. After each guess, the colour of the boxes will change to show you if your guess was close.

Feel free to request to have a word added if you find one that is missing and please report any bugs you find.

(Share is not working in browser)

Download the app on Android from the Google Play Store.

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.godotengine.wordzle
